author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, change libsvn_repos to use the generic
FS functions, and add an "fs-type" option to svnadmin create to
specify the FS type.  For now, svnadmin knows how to translate FS
types to FSAP names; that may change depending on developer consensus.
(cmd_table): Add fs-type option to create command.
(subcommand_create): Handle fs_type argument, mapping it to an

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, execute the great symbol rename in
- svn_fs__ becomes svn_fs__base, for the most part.
- Type names and constant names lose svn_fs__ prefix.

author: ehu
msg: Add gettext translation for general error messages.
Change string constants to expanded strings for xgettext retrieval.
